suggestedArtifacts.name: User Personas
suggestedArtifacts.description: Create distinct user personas based on identified target audience segments such as Product Designers, Product Managers, and Engineers.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: Clear user needs and goals identified among various target audience segments, enabling the creation of representative personas.

suggestedArtifacts.name: User Journey Maps
suggestedArtifacts.description: Document the user journey from the initial project creation to feedback iterations, highlighting pain points and opportunities for enhancement.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: The detailed user workflow outlined elucidates steps where users experience challenges, making mapping essential for improvement.

suggestedArtifacts.name: Pain Point Dashboard
suggestedArtifacts.description: Visualize common user friction points and insights generated during predictive modeling and user journey mapping.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: Identified thematic focus on pain points and need for proactive identification of issues aligns with this artifact's purpose.

dataSegments.name: Product Designers
dataSegments.description: Designers seeking streamlined workflows and tools to simulate user journeys and identify friction points proactively.

dataSegments.name: Product Managers
dataSegments.description: Managers requiring faster insight-to-action cycles and clearer forecasts on design impact.

dataSegments.name: Engineers/Developers
dataSegments.description: Technical users benefiting from clear design specifications and reduced ambiguity in interaction sequences.
